### Preprocessing settings

## data_pilot.csv
- high-pass filter: 0.4 Hz
- time window: 216-466 ms
- electrodes: Fz

## data_pilot_acq_low.csv
- high-pass filter: 0.4 Hz
- time window: 200-600 ms
- electrodes: Fz,F3,F4,FC5,FC6,C4,F7,F8

## data_pilot_rec_low.csv
- high-pass filter: 0.4 Hz
- time window: 200-600 ms
- electrodes: Fz,F3,F4,FC5,FC6,C4,F7,F8

## data_pilot_acq_high.csv
- high-pass filter: 1 Hz
- time window: 200-600 ms
- electrodes: Fz,F3,F4,FC5,FC6,Cz,C3,C4,F7,F8

## data_pilot_rec_high.csv
- high-pass filter: 1 Hz
- time window: 250-600 ms
- electrodes: Fz,F3,F4,FC5,FC6,Cz,C3,C4,F7,F8
